title.rendered: Forbes reports: How To Identify A True Multi-Family Office

excerpt.rendered: According to Alvarium’s Jose Remy, anyone calling themselves a family office should be offering independent advice. Thus, genuine multi-family offices offer numerous experts dedicated exclusively to the benefit of their clients.
